document.full_text: silver soared to an all-time high on thursday and gold rose to another record, as a falling dollar and signs that the federal reserve would maintain a loose monetary policy boosted precious metals' appeal as a hedge against inflation and economic uncertainty.
document.title: silver hits record near $50, first time since 1980
lines_and_colors: silver soared to an all-time high on thursday and gold rose to another record, as a falling dollar and signs that the federal reserve would maintain a loose monetary policy boosted precious metals' appeal as a hedge against inflation and economic uncertainty.
